website_summaries.verdict: Excellent quality headphones that are great both for making calls and for listening to music.
pros: Features active noise cancellation that is great for making calls in a noisy environment, but still allows you to hear your own voice
Busy signal light alerts people to when you're on a call
Good quality sound for both calls and music
cons: The headphones are a little heavy when compared to other similar models

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, but low volume and received background noise.
customer_reviews.text: Got these because I'm working from home with construction outside. Noise cancelling not quite as good as my Bose earbuds, but good enough. Over-the ear style and padded headband makes them very comfortable for wearing several hours a day. Others in virtual meetings say that my voice is very clear with no extra noise. Two main concerns. First, the volume is very low. I have to turn my computer volume to about 70% to get the same volume as my old headphones at 8%. Second, I get occasional crackling or popping noises, especially when listening to music (doesn't happen often on calls). Jabra is trying to figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Polurker

customer_reviews.title: Great for use on long conference calls.
customer_reviews.text: Love this headset. Bought to avoid all tech issues with wireless headsets. Great for web conferences and cell phone conferences. The head cushion sit closer to the forehead, which makes if comfortable for the many hours I can wear it during the day. I hear myself when connected via USB but not when connected by the plug. Bought with Amazon Smile to support Little Sisters of the Poor.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: excellent for call centers
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these headphones. i work in acall center with two rows of cubes facing each other and we have short walls. it get very loud! these headphones have been the best thing i could have done for myself. I no longer get lost in conversations, and it allows me to concentrate better. they are a little heavy and and tight, but hoping they loosen up over time. I haven’t listened to any of my calls since using theseso i’m not sure how the mic quality is, but i feel like my conversations go smoother in general. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Holly buol

customer_reviews.title: Love em but they aren't cheap!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way they fit and the mic is great for blocking background noise. I can talk in a coffee shop and 1)the person on the phone can hear me and 2) I look like a cool hipster with oversized headphones...until they see my mic and realize I'm a dorky business guy. Tip: use the ANC when on the phone...otherwise you hear yourself and it's weird.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: My gripe is with the seller, not the headset but at the same time the headset did not impress me
customer_reviews.text: If the seller hadn't misrepresented the supposedly "like new" pair they likely would have worked for me. However, during the short time I wore them for me they weren't as comfortable as similar high end headsets. ANC seemed good. Sound quality also was good.For me they just weren't comfortable. However, that's subjective so likely not a good datapoint for others.
customer_reviews.author: Koop

customer_reviews.title: Noise canceling
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of them for my team who work in tight corners and the noise cancellation works great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset, but Newer Models Seem Cheaply Made and Easily Break. - Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great headset, I use it regularly for work, conference calls, etc. I don't like that I am no longer able to use the headset with the new iPhone setup (have to plug into jack). This was my 2nd pair and the plastic on the mic stem has broken (it feels very cheaply made compared to my 1st purchase). It wiggles as you move your jaw and often giving feedback. I just bought the most expensive Bose set as a replacement and I love these Jabras so much more (for work purposes and sound on important calls). The quality just
customer_reviews.author: TWhite

customer_reviews.title: Very positive feedback
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my needs which was conference calls from a home office (including via laptop and mobile device). A bit heavy, but that is my only complaint. Everything else is great (mic, noise canceling, compatibility, etc). Because I work from home I need equipment I can rely on. For me, this wired headset fit the bill and was worth the expense.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Defective set
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set that i bought and the noise cancellation feature stopped working 2 weeks after using them. The other issue is that the device in between the headphones and usb connections keeps flashing and has never worked.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: It’s unconfirtable, it’s hot, it’s heavy, the noise cancelling make me feel like i have my head in a microwave hoven and it’s horribly expensive. I hate it, i will never buy Jabra product again.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas T

customer_reviews.title: A torture device
customer_reviews.text: A grip so tight on your head that after 30 minutes the pain goes from ears to jawline. The most uncomfortable earphones I ever tried. What a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Acosta-Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many headphones trying to find one that actually cancelled noise. My husband and I both work from home and I chose this one while he preferred the Bose 25. So for cancellation the Bose wins but this one is not far behind. But the perk about the Jabra is that you can hear yourself talking when they are on which is huge! And no echo! Awesome! Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Janii Fech

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable, give me a headache
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones for work to make calls in a noisy area. The noise cancellation feature is great, but they give me a terrible headache. I have tried adjusting them, but they are just too tight. I, unfortunately, cannot use them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The padding is non existent very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Awfully uncomfortable cannot wear them for long. Sound quality is good. Not worth the cost. These hurt.
customer_reviews.author: JonZ

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was eagerly awaiting the arrival of these headphones. Working in a call center, the noise is distracting. I put these on and in a matter of 10 minutes actually felt like I was sea sick. Sound quality is great as well as noise cancellation, however I could not handle wearing them. Back they went.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sidetone lasted 31 days
customer_reviews.text: These headphones were exactly what I wanted until the sidetone failed, and if you can't hear yourself talk these are practically useless. Normally that might not be a dealbreaker but for $300 headphones it's not acceptable. I've used Jabra headsets throughout my career but this is the last one I'll buy. Save yourself the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Incredible headset, amazing call quality.
customer_reviews.text: I work for a software company and I spend a great deal of time on my PC contacting clients with Skype for Business. This headset is the best of its kind. It is definitely pricey but I think it is worth every penny. The noise cancellation on these is incredible. I could be in a very noisy room and have no issue hearing the other party. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mright123

customer_reviews.title: Best headset I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best headset I’ve ever owned on all levels. Extremely comfortable to wear, audio quality is perfect, mic performance is crystal clear. I spend a lot of time on the phone when I’m in the office and this headset has surpassed my expectations my miles.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable flexible easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I wear 8 size fitted caps and headset fits. Nice option for usb or usual audio plug. Love flexible mic and orange colored cord! It Makes cord standout avoid tangling. Worked great on computer or docking port connection.
customer_reviews.author: Jls

customer_reviews.title: Reliable quality calls. Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for the one I had before that was damaged in a move. I liked it so much I bought the same one again. Consistent good quality sound and comfort while working help desk service calls.
customer_reviews.author: David Aardema

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and it doesnt work trying to figure out why my friends has one and his works but this one doesnt at all very sad i was looking forward using the headset
customer_reviews.author: Delfino Perez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them for work. They do a great job canceling background noise. Also use them at home for movies and music. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Raspotnik

customer_reviews.title: They can’t hear your keyboard
customer_reviews.text: As suspected, they make your ears warm after wearing for an extended period of time. But the sound quality is amazing. No one hears me typing while my mic is open anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Arrived defective
customer_reviews.text: Arrived defective seems as if speakers or cord may have been damaged. Full return.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: For Work & Play
customer_reviews.text: I really don't see much I don't like about these headsets. I use them for work and for gaming when I stream. I had the Evolve 40s but wanted the Noise Cancelling so I decided to upgrade and I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: BKÓYO

customer_reviews.title: Great product for work
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Blocks noise great and great audio and mic quality
customer_reviews.author: Michael D

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: Headset is definitely worth the money. Very comfortable and it does a good job of blocking outside noise.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Owww
customer_reviews.text: This headset has great audio no doubt. BUT they squeeze my head like a grape and are hot and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: James D. Gebhardt

customer_reviews.title: Noise Canelling good, Micro not
customer_reviews.text: Noise Canelling good, Micro not, Not works when you are working in an open office, micro gets too much noise
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Altamirano Meraz

customer_reviews.title: Great for calling and music
customer_reviews.text: Feels good to wear for multiple hours and the sound/voice quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Higdon

customer_reviews.title: Not loving it...
customer_reviews.text: Poor sound quality. Boxy plastic sound. Music does not sound smooth. Ear fatigue comes quick. Uncomfortable both physically on the ear as well as sonically uncomfortable. Boom mic doesn't work as well as expected. No real noise cancellation in the boom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OMG - the top bracket just snaps - its terrible! both pairs broke in the same place
customer_reviews.text: OMG - the top bracket just snaps - its terrible! both pairs broke in the same place. Honestly the $25 logitech headset is just as good! $500 for 2 and they both broke within 2 years - that is nonsense. Don't buy these headsets, they are overpriced and they physically break.
customer_reviews.author: Green

customer_reviews.title: Simply AWESOME! LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first review of any product and I'm only doing this one because I was so impressed with it! I've been actively prospecting for about 16 years and as you have probably guessed it, I've bought and tried many headsets and this is by far THE best one I've ever had! I prospect in a office that there are alot of distractions and the active noise reduction is REALLY good! Super Clear, Super Comfortable! I've read a few of these reviews saying the headset is a little heavy... No that's called quality... As soon as you put these on you know they are quality... I just bought these for a few others on my team!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: These are worth the investment. Sound quality is very good. More comfortable than two other headsets that I own. I love the controls. The product description is a bit deceiving. It makes it sound like you can plug it into a USB-c. You can. But, you need to buy an adapter that doesn't come with it.
customer_reviews.author: EyerishAngel

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I received my headphones today. There was no sound in the right headphone. I charged it thoroughly and still the same problem. I called Jabra support and after waiting on hold for 29 minutes while listening to elevator music (in one ear), I gave up. I emailed support and didn't hear back. I'm returning them. I don't think I can buy another pair. At this price I would be too worried about how long they will last.
customer_reviews.author: Edward R Slavis

customer_reviews.title: Love this headset
customer_reviews.text: Ask your boss to buy you one - I got one when I started my job, and a year later broke the mic bar (my fault, but if something breaks, it'll be that piece so be careful) and loved the headset so much I bought a new one out of pocket. They're not as comfortable as my DJ headphones with felt earpieces, but not that far off.
customer_reviews.author: rdnblue

customer_reviews.title: Love these things - Got to know them well over a year ago - finally purchased my own personal pair.
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of them issued to me a couple of years ago by my then employer. I returned them when I left the job and have missed them ever since. Finally purchased my own pair and they are still as awesome now as they were back then.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo Darino

customer_reviews.title: Bad mic- it was good for 4 months!
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I'm very disappointed because all of a sudden the mic stopped working. I need this device to do important transcription work and I am in the middle of a job with a deadline soon to come and my Jabra Evolve 80 have failed me. I paid over $256.00 and was not expecting it to last less than 6 months. I bought it in May 2020. I feel defrauded. I'm going to try by all means to get my money back or to get a full new set. This is totally unacceptable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Very good for WFH but heavy
customer_reviews.text: This headset is just what I need for my conference calls. However, it is super heavy on my head. After a day of using this, my neck and head feels heavy and sore. Wish this was made with lighter material without compromising on quality.
customer_reviews.author: S.H

customer_reviews.title: I can also hear my voice clearly so overall it's the best I've used
customer_reviews.text: I work in a loud call center and the active noise cancellation works well. I can also hear my voice clearly so overall it's the best I've used. I've had several headsets and I've had problems with most of them. Either the noise cancellation worked and the mic didn't or visa versa. This is the best overall headset for working in a loud call center that I've found.
customer_reviews.author: F. J. A. Sue

customer_reviews.title: You have been looing for a great phone headset ... this is it
customer_reviews.text: I have tried every tried just about every Bluetooth headset out there and have never been truly satisfied. i spend a lot of time on the phone in my business and this headset allows me to work very well, even in noisy situations. It is wired plugs into my Iphone 6 plus as well as my computer -- great tool and I will be using this for a long time
customer_reviews.author: Jim R

customer_reviews.title: Amazing clarity. Works perfect. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked at the superior audio clarity for holding a phone call in a noisy room. Literally High-Definition voice audio. Will likely purchase another one for others working in the same atmosphere I do. Only downside is the pricetag...but in this case, you are getting what you paid for!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Over the ear perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely what you need in a busy office center if you get distracted easily.
customer_reviews.author: charles leather

customer_reviews.title: Overall winner
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality and noise cancellation are very good, not the best but of very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nickolaus A Orwin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for staff member - they are very satisfied, the product works well with SKYPE.
customer_reviews.author: Highland Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product shipped in a timely fashion and in working great condition. Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: William C.

product_meta.title: Jabra Evolve 80 MS Wired Headset Professional Telephone Headphones with Unrivalled Noise Cancellation for Calls and Music, Features World Class Speakers and All Day Comfort
product_meta.description: Style:Skype Optimized| Pattern Name:SingleThe Jabra Evolve 80 Professional Headset is engineered to be the best headset for concentration in an open office. It’s built to eliminate noise with Jabra’s unique Active Noise Cancellation (ANC) that filters out low frequency background noise. Plus the uniquely designed ear cushions are not only built for all day comfort but they also block out high frequency sounds so you can enjoy the immersive world class speakers without distractions. Whether you’re on a call or working on a task needing your full attention this office headset has an integrated busy light on the ear cups letting people around you clearly see your availability. You can activate the red busy light to create your own concentration zone and keep you from being disturbed whenever required. Find inspiration in sound with an immersive music experience delivered by world class speakers in this premium around the ear office headset. Get easy access at your fingertips to the most used functions like answer calls volume up/down and mute microphone. Plus the simple plug and play setup allows the Jabra Evolve 80 Headset to work straight out of the box. Installation is as easy as simply plugging it into the USB A or USB C port or 3.5mm jack. The Jabra Evolve 80 Wired Headset works with all leading UC platforms. Certified for Skype for Business Cisco and more.
feature_bullets: INCREASE AGENT FOCUS Along with ANC; an integrated busy light notifies colleagues when a call is in process to avoid interruptions. You can also manually activate it to create your own concentration zone and keep from being disturbed whenever required
WORLD CLASS SOUND Find inspiration in sound with an immersive music experience delivered by world class speakers in this premium around the ear work headset
ALL DAY COMFORT With leather feel ear cushions and around the ear design; this Jabra headset is built for comfortable all day use

COMPATIBILITY The Jabra Evolve 80 Wired Headset works with all leading UC platforms. Certified for Skype for Business; Cisco; and more. Plus; it features simple plug and play setup with a USB A; USB C; or 3.5mm jack connection options

What’s in the box:Brown box including Evolve 80 headset, Poly bag for Quick Start Guide and WWD, Quick Start Guide, Warning leaflet, Warranty leaflet, USB Controller, Poly bag for controller, Skype for Business Label (only if specified in BOM)

UNRIVALLED NOISE CANCELLATION The Jabra Evolve 80 Wired Headset is built to eliminate noise. Jabra’s unique Active Noise Cancellation (ANC) filters out low frequency background noise to help avoid interruptions and increase focus

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars199 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
specifications.Best Sellers Rank: #599 in On-Ear Headphones#835 in Over-Ear Headphones
specifications.Included Components: Evolve 80 headset, Poly bag for controller, Poly bag for Quick Start Guide and WWD, Warranty leaflet, Skype for business label, USB Controller, Warning leaflet, Quick Start Guide
